NAFG-LPA.MX.long_name: Fondo Gubernamental de Largo Plazo Nafinsa SA de CV F.I.I.D. A
NAFG-LPA.MX.summary: The Fund aims to invest exclusively in long-term government debt securities, and will take as a reference the VLMR_MEX_GUBERNAMENTAL_LP index less expenses and taxes generated by each series. Whereas the objectives of the society, recommended investors keep their investment for at least three years. The Fund is aimed at investors looking for high-risk investments, based on its goal of long-term, strategy, rating and assets in which it invests. This risk is associated mainly to the market, and especially at risk in nominal and real interest rates, every time that the characteristics of the values that make up your portfolio are subject to fluctuations to upward and downward markets listed. The society is directed to small, medium and large investors, whereas the minimum amounts of investment and the level of complexity or sophistication.
NAFG-LPA.MX.family: Operadora de Fondos Nafinsa SA de CV

SURBONOA.MX.short_name: SURA Bono SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
SURBONOA.MX.long_name: SURA Bono SA de CV S.I.I.D. A
SURBONOA.MX.summary: The Fund will invest mainly in securities issued by the Federal Government with maturity greater than one year, issued fixed Peso rate, with securities denominated in UDIS, banking and private values placed through public offering, development banking bonds and bonds issued by State or municipal, with nominal rate, Governments looking to have income attractive, trying to preserve capital or, even get additional income arising from movements in the markets.
SURBONOA.MX.family: SURA Investment Management MÃ©xico SA de CV
